text: Roger Enrico (November 11, 1944 - June 1, 2016) was an American businessman. He was born in Chisholm, Minnesota. He was known for being the Chairman of PepsiCo from 1996 to 2001 and Chairman of DreamWorks Animation SKG Inc from 2004 to 2012. He served on the Board of Directors of the National Geographic Society, the Environmental Defense Fund, the Solar Electric Light Fund, and the American Film Institute. Enrico died of a heart attack while snorkeling at his private Cayman Islands home on June 1, 2016, aged 71. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Businesspeople from Minnesota
